steps.title: Welcome to the Smart Assistant!
steps.content: Your personal assistant that understands and responds to your emotions. Let's explore the key features.

steps.title: Voice Input

steps.title: Listen to Responses

tooltips.settings: Click here to customize assistant settings such as dialect, tone, and preferred voice
tooltips.clearChat: Click here to clear all messages and start a new conversation
tooltips.voiceInput: Click here to speak directly to the assistant using the microphone
tooltips.inputField: You can type any question or request here. Try questions like 'How are you?' or 'What's the weather today?' or 'Tell me a story'
tooltips.sendButton: Click here to send your message to the assistant
tooltips.ttsToggleOn: Click to disable automatic reading of responses
tooltips.ttsToggleOff: Click to enable automatic reading of responses
tooltips.ttsMode: Click to toggle between text-to-speech modes (Flask TTS or Web Speech API)
tooltips.emotionTag: These are the emotions detected in the message. The assistant analyzes emotions to provide a more empathetic response.
tooltips.modelTag: This is the model used to generate this response. It could be a local model or a Flask backend model.
tooltips.timestamp: This is the time when the message was sent
